LOGIN_1: Log in with your favourite social network account to enter our App crew! Don't worry, the social login is ONLY used to uniquely identify you, assign you points and badges and list you in the leaderboard. The game will NEVER post anything on your behalf.
YOU_PLAYED_AS_GUEST: You played as guest, so those points are lost! Log in with your favorite social network and save next game's points!
